    Limelight vision target

      Get the horizontal sidelength of the rough bounding box (0 - 320 pixels)

    • Constructor Detail

      • Target

        public Target​(double tx,
              double ty,
              double ta,
              double ts,
              double tshort,
              double tlong,
              double thor,
              double tvert)
        Create a LimelightTarget
        Parameters:
        tx - Horizontal Offset From Crosshair To Target
        ty - Vertical Offset From Crosshair To Target
        ta - Target area (0% of image to 100% of image)
        ts - Target skew (-90 degrees to 0 degrees)
        tshort - Sidelength of shortest side of the fitted bounding box (pixels)
        tlong - Sidelength of longest side of the fitted bounding box (pixels)
        thor - Horizontal sidelength of the rough bounding box (0 - 320 pixels)
        tvert - Vertical sidelength of the rough bounding box (0 - 320 pixels)
